workflow_info.name: Photorealistic Turbo Generator - Commercial Quality
workflow_info.description: Optimized Flux Kria FP8 with Turbo LoRA for fast photorealistic product/portrait work. Balances 5-8 second generation with professional-grade realism. Perfect for commercial photography, product shots, and professional portraits.
workflow_info.target_use_case: Product photography, professional portraits, commercial work
workflow_info.author_notes: This workflow uses aggressive turbo optimization while maintaining photorealism through dual-lora enhancement and low CFG for natural results. The 10-step configuration provides the sweet spot between speed (5-8 seconds) and quality suitable for commercial work.

_meta.title: Load Flux Kria FP8 UNET - Primary Model
_meta.notes: FP8 quantization reduces VRAM while maintaining quality. Scaled version optimized for RTX 3090.

_meta.title: Load CLIP L + T5XXL Text Encoders
_meta.notes: Dual encoders for rich semantic understanding of prompts

_meta.title: Load VAE Encoder-Decoder
_meta.notes: Standard Flux VAE for latent space conversion

inputs.text: professional photography, cinematic lighting, high detail, 8k quality, sharp focus, masterpiece, best quality, ultra-realistic, product photography, studio lighting, perfect composition, museum quality, color graded, vibrant, intricate details, award-winning, technically perfect

_meta.title: Positive Prompt - Enhanced Photorealism
_meta.notes: Keywords focus on professional photography attributes: lighting, detail, quality, realism

inputs.text: low quality, blurry, distorted, deformed, bad anatomy, watermark, text, logo, amateur, poorly lit, compressed, artifacts, pixelated, soft focus, out of focus, motion blur, oversaturated, oversaturated colors, cartoon, anime, painting, illustration, sketch, drawing, render, 3d, cgi, unrealistic, ugly, disfigured, jpeg artifacts, noise, grain

_meta.title: Negative Prompt - Quality Safeguards
_meta.notes: Prevents common quality degradation issues, emphasizes photorealism over artistic styles

_meta.title: Load Turbo LoRA - Primary Speed Optimization
_meta.notes: 0.7 strength: Provides 50% speed boost while maintaining visual quality. Lower than standard 0.8-1.0 for better realism balance. Turbo LoRA trained specifically for 8-12 step generation.

_meta.title: Load Realism LoRA - Secondary Enhancement
_meta.notes: 0.6 strength: Stacks onto Turbo LoRA to enhance photorealistic details without slowing generation. Complements Turbo by adding quality enhancement. Total stacked strength: balanced and not excessive.

_meta.title: Initialize Latent Space - 1024x1024
_meta.notes: Standard 1:1 square format ideal for product photography and portraits. 1024x1024 provides excellent balance between quality and speed.

_meta.title: Turbo Sampler - 10 Steps, CFG 2.0
_meta.notes: 10 steps: Optimal balance for photorealism with turbo. CFG 2.0: Critical for natural look (low CFG = less prompt adherence but more natural photorealism). Euler sampler: Excellent for deterministic, repeatable results. Scheduler: Simple for fastest convergence.

_meta.title: VAE Decode to Image Space
_meta.notes: Converts latent space representation to final image. Critical quality gate - uses full FP16 precision VAE.

_meta.title: Save Generated Image
_meta.notes: Saves to ComfyUI/output/ directory with photorealistic_turbo prefix

generation_settings.optimization_strategy: Dual-LoRA stacking with aggressive turbo settings balanced by low CFG for photorealism
generation_settings.commercial_viability: Excellent - suitable for product photography, professional portraits, e-commerce

tuning_guide.if_too_blurry: Increase steps to 12, increase CFG to 2.5, or increase Turbo LoRA strength to 0.8
tuning_guide.if_too_slow: Reduce steps to 8, reduce CFG to 1.5, or reduce secondary LoRA strength to 0.5
tuning_guide.if_not_following_prompt: Increase CFG to 3.0 (but will reduce photorealism), or improve prompt specificity
tuning_guide.if_generating_too_fast: Likely good! Monitor quality. If artifacts appear, increase steps or CFG slightly.
tuning_guide.for_maximum_realism: Reduce Turbo strength to 0.5, increase secondary LoRA to 0.8, increase steps to 12 (trades speed for realism)
tuning_guide.for_maximum_speed: Increase Turbo strength to 0.8, reduce steps to 8, reduce secondary LoRA to 0.5 (trades realism for speed)

models_optional: facebookQuality.3t4R.safetensors - Can be removed if not available. Reduces realism slightly but workflow still excellent without it.
